column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////Neither my sister nor I are fan of deep dish pizza after our meal. We definitely prefer thin crust. I never thought I would say no to extra bread. However
column2: the pizza crust isn't very flavorful
column3: so the extra crust makes the pizza rather bland. To me the cheese
column5: crust ratio is off for deep dish pizza. Too much dough!! I'm still not a fan of deep dish and I think my next trip back I won't be going out of my way to try deep dish pizza.
